doc:
Geoffrey Lewis (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geoffrey_Lewis_(actor) 0 Geoffrey Bond Lewis (July 31, 1935 – April 7, 2015) was an American character actor. Lewis was known for his film roles alongside Robert Redford and Clint Eastwood. He typically played villains. He also played a bodyguard in Double Impact. Geoffrey_Bond_Lewis ( July_31_,_1935 – April_7_,_2015 ) was an_American_character_actor . Lewis was_known for his_film_roles alongside Robert_Redford and Clint_Eastwood . He typically played villains . He also played a_bodyguard in Double_Impact .
